name: LinkGrep
headline: AI browser copilot for teams
description:
Modern teams work in the browser. But browsers weren't built for teams üòî. 

This leads to a bunch of problems like:
- Knowledge/info that is hard to find (links that get lost, documentation that gets, buried, silos, etc)
- Poor collaboration
- Inefficient workflows

LinkGrep is an AI browser copilot that solves those problems by making your browser team friendly.

Specifically we help teams:
1. üîó Keep track of links, documents, and more automatically. With LinkGrep you'll never have to manually add or save a link.
2. üîç Find information that matters. LinkGrep connects with your existing tools like Notion and Slack and will automatically suggest relevant information to you as your browse (we have semantic search that you can fallback on). Demo: https://youtu.be/jwcPGDRy4oQ
3. üë• Collaborate better. LinkGrep lets you leave notes and comments directly on web pages ‚Äî¬†you won't ever have to copy paste a link into Slack ever again. 
4. ü§ñ Automate team actions like opening up the right links before a meeting. Never disrupt a meeting to send a link again. Demo: https://youtu.be/an3VKpAWft0
tags: industry:b2b; industry:productivity; industry:collaboration; industry:remote-work; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Divyagnan Kandala, Founder
founders.description: Love working on developer & productivity tools. Previously was a frontend engineer at Stripe, Uber, and Amazon.

founders.name: TJ Kandala, Founder
founders.description: Dev and productivity tool builder. Previously was a software engineer at Sourcegraph where I worked on a bunch of extensions (VS Code, Browser, and the Sourcegraph extensions platform).

raw_markdown="![LinkGrep](https://linkgrep.com/_astro/linkgrep-logo-wide-no-pad.4f3857e7.png)
# Making browsers team friendly
[Request Early Access ‚Üí](https://linkgrep.com/<https:/cal.com/linkgrep/30min>)
Modern teams work in the browser. But browsers weren't built for teams. üòî
LinkGrep is an AI browser copilot that makes your browser team friendly.
LinkGrep:
  * Automatically keeps track of all of your teams links
  * Suggests information from your knowledge bases while you browse
  * Opens up the right links before your meetings
  * Makes collaboration easier through contextual notes & comments on webpages
  * And more...


Here's a sneak peak ü§´
LinkGrep automatically suggests information from your browser history + knowledge bases (like Slack or Notion) while you browse. Think of it as an automatic second brain for your whole team.
LinkGrep can figure out what links you need to have open before a meeting and suggest them to you. Now no one on your team will ever have to ask for a link ever again.
Ready to make your team more effective?
[Request Early Access ‚Üí](https://linkgrep.com/<https:/cal.com/linkgrep/30min>)

generated_description:
**LinkGrep: Your AI-Powered Browser Copilot for Teams**

Founded in 2023 and nestled in the vibrant tech sphere of San Francisco, LinkGrep is tackling a crucial problem: browsers weren‚Äôt designed for team collaboration. Modern teams are increasingly reliant on browsers for work, yet they often struggle with inefficiencies like lost information, poor collaboration, and cumbersome workflows. Enter LinkGrep‚Äîa revolutionary AI browser copilot set to transform the way teams operate within web environments.

### The Mission
LinkGrep's mission is simple yet ambitious: to make your browser team-friendly. By providing essential tools that streamline how teams share, find, and collaborate on information, LinkGrep reimagines the browsing experience to better suit collaborative efforts.

### Key Features
1. **Automatic Link Tracking**: Forget the hassle of manually saving links. LinkGrep effortlessly keeps track of all your team‚Äôs links and documents.
2. **Intelligent Information Retrieval**: With integrations into popular tools like Notion and Slack, LinkGrep suggests relevant resources while you browse, ensuring you always find the information that matters.
3. **Enhanced Collaboration**: No more copying and pasting links into your chat tools! Leave notes and comments directly on web pages‚Äîmaking team discussions more contextual and productive.
4. **Meeting Ready**: LinkGrep can anticipate which links you need open for meetings and prepare them in advance. That means no more frantic searches for vital resources just as the meeting starts.

### Getting Started
Curious to see LinkGrep in action? You can book early access through their [website](https://linkgrep.com). For a quick demo, check out their [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@linkgrep) channel.

### Where They Stand
Currently part of Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch W23, LinkGrep is supported by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell and is emerging as a key player in the realms of B2B productivity, collaboration, and remote work solutions. With a lean team of two, they are poised for rapid growth in a demanding market.

### Join the Movement
If you‚Äôre looking to enhance your team's effectiveness and redefine browser-based collaboration, LinkGrep could be exactly what you need. Don‚Äôt miss out; request early access [here](https://linkgrep.com).

---

LinkGrep is where the future of team-based browsing begins‚Äîmaking collaborative online work seamless, straightforward, and surprisingly fun.
